meanings.sent1: The feather was the floatiest object in the pond.
meanings.sent2: The balloon was the floatiest of all the objects in the air.
meanings.sent3: The floatiest cloud looked like a fluffy pillow in the sky.
meanings.sent4: Her floatiest thoughts drifted aimlessly like bubbles in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The floatiest leaf gently glided on the water's surface.

meanings.sent1: Among the boats, the yacht was the floatiest on the water.
meanings.sent2: The feather was the floatiest of all the objects in the pond.
meanings.sent3: The floatiest rubber duck in the bathtub always won the race.
meanings.sent4: In the sea of bubbles, the floatiest one rose to the top.
meanings.sent5: The floatiest cloud in the sky seemed to be made of cotton candy.
